Name: Metori
About the game: Metori is a strategy sandbox game reminiscent of older arcade games. Control many ships, and use tactics to outmaneuver and outnumber everyone else. Build a fleet. Capture territory. Defeat your enemies. Note: Metori is not a twin-stick shooter. It is built to be playable with one hand, making it accessible to many gamers. Features Smart, Tactical Enemy AI! Replayable sandbox gameplay! 1V1 Local multiplayer! Content Randomly generated maps Many ship types with variants Fight customizable Commanders! Campaign Replayable Instant Action Missions
Meta Title: Metori: Apr 3, 2019, Enemby Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Metori? Check out the release date (Apr 3, 2019), developer insights from Enemby Games, and a complete game summary.
